creator: MyCareAid LLC
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to My Care Aid App, the all-in-one physician-led health app that helps you take full control of your health. Say goodbye to the hassle of managing your health records the old-fashioned way and much more.
Ten Reasons to Install My Care Aid:
1. Store and share all your medical history with a tap of a button form your mobile phone!
Save time, papers and efforts next time you go to your healthcare provider.
Instead of answering questions about your allergies, medications, past medical conditions, past surgeries, family history and social habits, you can easily open your My Care Aid app and share all the above with your healthcare provider with one tap!

2. No more guessing or remembering your medications.
No more saying like “I take small white pill or red and white capsule!” No need to bring all of your medications to the hospital or to the clinic anymore! Instead share detailed information about your medications including the medication’s photo with your healthcare provider from your mobile phone!

3. Medication and Refill Reminders:
Never miss a medication and medications refill again. My Care Aid App sends you timely reminders to keep you on track.

4. Medical Records Upload to a secured encrypted cloud server:
Easily upload your medical records using your mobile camera. No more paperwork storage.

5. Health Logs and Share:
Keep track of your blood pressure, blood sugar, sleep, mood and any other symptoms or diseases. Then easily share these readings with your doctor or family members with just one tap. This will improve your blood pressure and blood sugar control and will reduce complications and negative outcomes.

6. Customized Screening and Prevention Plan:
My Care Aid app helps you stay on top of your preventive health care by creating a customized screening plan from the United States Prevention Services Task Force (USPSTF) guidelines based on your age and gender

7. Weight Management, Fitness, Meal Planning, and Calorie Counting (English language only):
My Care Aid App has a feature that allows you to set your fitness goals, track your calorie and water intake, plan your meals, and monitor your progress to achieve your optimal desired weight. This feature is available in English language only so far.

8. Appointment Reminders:
Never forget a medical appointment again. My Care Aid App sends you reminders before your appointments.

9. Second Opinions (Not available to US residents and citizens):
Gold and Diamond plan subscribers can access monthly second opinion consults from American Board-certified doctors.

10. Physician-Led APP:
My Care Aid App is designed and led by experienced physicians who understand the importance of patient safety and the importance of having accurate information to reach accurate diagnosis, and treatment.

We offer 3 main subscription plans as silver, gold, diamond and family plans so that you can choose the right one for you. For your convenience subscriptions are set to Auto-Renew within 24 hours period prior to the subscription end date. You can cancel your subscription at any moment from cancel subscription inside the Subscription section on the sidebar menu of the app. Please note that refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the terms. Payment will be charged to your stored credit card at purchase confirmation. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription plan to that publication where applicable.

Terms of use: https://app.termly.io/document/terms-of-use-for-website/23912d84-a422-4bef-b56c-006d49db3ced
Privacy Policy: https://app.termly.io/document/privacy-policy/ea4c8fc4-4c0c-4c00-bcff-cb1579fb6258
Website: https://www.mycareaid.com

Take control of your health today with My Care Aid App. Download it now and experience the difference.
title: My Care Aid
